resources.string: This is the free play mode. Here you can design your own ciruit.
Turn on the light by connection the battery with the lamp.

Add a resistor to the circuit, so the light won\'t break. Add a resistor to the circuit, so the light won\'t break. To add the resistor, you have to remove a wire. This can be done by touching a wire in wire mode. Run the circuit when you are done.
Add a switch to the circuit, so you can flick the Lamp on and off. Afterwards press the switch to turn the lamp on.
Now you understand all components, make your own circuit with 2 lightbulbs and a way to turn the lights off and on.
